Main.Title: FMS Mod Manager
Main.AboutDescription: FMS Mod Manager is a tool for managing FMS Mods.

Index.ReligionModDescription: Create and manage religion systems in the game, including religion names, holy books, practices, etc.
Index.CultureModDescription: Create and manage culture systems in the game, including culture names, features, customs, etc.

Religion.Title: Religion Mod
Religion.Description: Create and manage religion systems in the game, including religion names, holy books, practices, etc.

Culture.Title: Culture Mod
Culture.Description: Create and manage culture systems in the game, including culture names, features, customs, etc.
